name: The 3rd Int'l Conference on Advances in Biological Breeding
content: The 3rd Int'l Conference on Advances in Biological Breeding (ICABB 2019) will be held during May 29-31, 2019 in Kunming, China. The conference will cover issues on Advances in Biological Breeding. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
